title: Good Vibes at the Vine
description:
Do you believe in the legend of True Springs?
Darcy didn’t walk away from Jeremy, she ran. How can he possibly trust her again?Jeremy’s Pittsburgh music club will tank without a sell-his-soul kind of cash infusion. When his ex-college girlfriend—practically a billionaire—turns up with an offer too good to be true, he suspects a hidden agenda. Darcy was robbed of a career and so much more, however investing in Jeremy’s club would jump start the new beginning she desperately needs. And she does have a hidden agenda: forgiveness, because she’s never gotten over Jeremy—her one true love.Is working together in close proximity too great of a risk to their battered hearts—or worth the shot at a second chance?A secret tore them apart, but the dream of a new beginning provides a second chance in this up-all-night, feel-good romance!Ticket to True Love is a steamy contemporary romance series about new beginnings, second chances, and finding true love in unexpected places. Fall in love all over the world with bestselling and award winning authors JB Schroeder, Savannah Kade, Moni Boyce, Shirley Hailstock, Holland Rae, Julie Strauss & Jennifer Wilck. Start your next romance with Good Vibes at the Vine now!
author: J.B. Schroeder
